name: Phase Shift (itch) (Squeeks)
description:
A top-down 2d puzzle game I made for the 3rd Blackthornprod game jam where you lessen the blocks on one side of the level but by doing so you add more to the other. If you like puzzle games please leave a comment for what I could do better.

If you are having trouble and want help on a level click the hint button in the top left and it will show you some recommended and non advised movements and placements.
